alert.note: Alert for Copper River Basin (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 02 at 1:55PM AKDT until October 03 at 4:00AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM AKDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches along the Richardson Highway from Paxon north to Isabel Pass. Additional snow accumulation up to 2 inches along the Glenn Highway and Tok Cutoff. North winds gusting to 40 mph north of Paxon this afternoon through Tuesday morning. * WHERE... Northern half of the Copper River Basin. * WHEN...Until 4 AM AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow from Paxon north could reduce visibility to one half mile at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
